A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People giving a fresh review are suffering from the same delusion that happened for the Phantom Menace. TPM had a much better lightsaber fight just to start. In this movie there is a 20-30 min portion that is pointless overall. New characters are introduced that I literally felt nothing for. There is one space battle with basically one xwing. The rebellions storyline is so weak and full of massive plot holes that \"How it should have ended\" will have a field day. This movie just fell completely flat. TFA was better for me in every way. This movie is currently 40% by fan rating for a damn good reason.
